text: How do I fix PyDev "Undefined variable from import" errors?
I've got a Python project using PyDev in Eclipse, and PyDev keeps generating false errors for my code.
I have a module settings that defines a settings object.
I import that in module b and assign an attribute with:

code:
from settings import settings
settings.main = object()

text: In some of my code--but not all of it, statements like:

code:
from settings import settings
print settings.main

text: ... generate "Undefined variable from import: main" messages in the Eclipse code error pane, even though the code runs without a problem.
